name: Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra
effect: [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit is Armed, [Soul-Charge 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If this unit is Armed with two or more cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], retire all of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor:
That which torments the body are prayers of despair.
That which dwells in the body is the blaze of thirst.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Halibadra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding from "Sealed Blaze Dragon, Namorkahr", choose an Arms card from your drop, and put it into your hand.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard is Armed, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The lost blaze wavers wildly in the midst of unfathomable loneliness.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Namorkahr
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding from "Sealed Blaze Dragon, Arhinsa", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih" or "Sealed Blaze Shield, Swayanbuh", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The burning blaze becomes a guiding light for those who are lost.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Arhinsa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: A single blaze is born with the purpose of shining light upon darkness.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Ulsalra
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose an Arms card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: What we found was but a portion of the sealed power.

name: Elecblow Dragon
flavor: You can choose to avoid this lightning strike, or grit your teeth and bear it.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Shirunga
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][discard an Arms card from your hand], and draw a card.
flavor: One's determination, will lead the way.

name: Escort Stealth Dragon, Hayashi Kaze
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: Battles are something that don't develop as one would wish them to.

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!
flavor: When they face themselves, man will realize an encounter with truth.

name: Conduct Spark Dragon
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Its anger is violent, and emits sparks.

name: Rushing Dragon, Steel Dilopho
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Even hidden prey is firmly caught in its proud fangs.

name: Stealth Dragon, Jaengoku
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Burn right down to the bone!

name: White Light Dragon, Parasolace
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: The more light there is, the stronger the vitality.

name: Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih
effect: Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" (After being played, the specified vanguard Arms it. If a new Right Deity Arms is Armed, put this card into the drop)Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC):When the unit Armed with this card attacks, that Armed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, if your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & put this card into your drop], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and deal one damage.
flavor: The despair of an era without prayers becomes a blade that will destroy the world.

name: Sealed Blaze Shield, Swayanbuh
effect: Left Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" (After being played, the specified vanguard Arms it. If a new Left Deity Arms is Armed, put this card into the drop)Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When the unit Armed with this card is attacked, that Armed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A maiden holding on to despair departs on a journey while bearing it all.
